sentence: During a segment discussing the Senate candidacies of celebrity TV doctor Mehmet Oz and former star football player Herschel Walker, Hostin decried the idea that Americans would vote to elect celebrities with no political experience, pointing to Trump as reason not to vote for them.
author: Brandon Gillespie
title: 'The View's' Sunny Hostin claims Trump 'ran the country into the ground' despite multiple crises under Biden
